attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore day 30th April every year in honor of Tom.
attributes.additional_details: As I've mentioned this guy is not only a war hero who fawt for our freedom he is also a guy who said I will walk up and down and all I want to do is raise £1000 for our NHS, we'll at present he is still walking up and down his garden and has said "whilst people keep donating ill keep walking" this guy is 99 years old and his birthday is 30th April, this guy is a hero who has raised 17 million for the NHS, incredible man should be knighted and a national holiday and a day of celebrations should be declared, last war serving hero and 99 years old. Incredible Captain Tom
attributes.background:
Captain Tom Moore
He was 99 years old and walked with his stroller aid up and down his garden to raise £1000 only, reason was to raise money for our NHS during Covid19 crisis.
He has raised over 17 million and is still raising, his birthday will be his 100th

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given an honour. In any case, Captain Moore has since been knighted.

You might like to sign this petition regarding a bank holiday

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364
